overview: Documentary on the growing trend towards naturism on Europe's beaches; John Pitman reports on the increasing popularity of naturist holidays and the changing attitudes towards them. He traces the growth of the naturist movement, from its small-time beginnings in a park in north Germany, to the multi-million-pound business it is today - especially for France and Yugoslavia.
tagline: Documentary on the growing trend towards naturism on Europe's beaches
title: Let's Go Naked
